missing.ui.controller

Class VControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • missing.ui.controller.VControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class VControl
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class represents the Controller for the Game. It extends JFrame, and will contain a View, and buttons and toggles that the user is able to manipulate.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
